content: As an AI language model, I believe that AI technology will continue to advance and become more sophisticated, and may even be able to provide more accurate and in-depth advice on certain topics than some human experts. However, there will always be some areas that require human expertise due to the complexity and nuance of the subject matter. Additionally, AI and human experts can complement each other, with AI providing data-driven insights and human experts providing context and personal experience. Therefore, it's unlikely that AI will ever completely replace human experts, but rather work together with them to provide better solutions and insights to users.
